channel.title: Offline/Online NPCs

item.title: Offline/Online NPCs
item.dc:creator: @jonaske jonaske
item.description:
@jonaske wrote:

about the on/off it only works when sombody logs after you
so if you log first and then ur friend logs second then it works
if u log 2nd and ur friend first it won’t work

about changing text :

go client.java press ctrl f and then typ in what there is on the log out bar (with me was it “poke me to log”) so i pressed ctrl f and typ poke me to log and then you change the text

easy

Read full topic

item.title: Offline/Online NPCs
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Briansclan")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Briansclan is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Briansclan is OFFLINE"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 797) {

i was told to do that so a npc would say my name wen i was online. Did it, logged on with the username, but the ghost was sayin i was offline…ne1 help me wit it?

Also…
anyone know how to change text on the logout bar, the text above the log out bar, and the message you get when u first log in

Read full topic
